channel.title: AG2 Maps
channel.description:
Yellow :slight_smile:
Could you upload some of the ag2 maps onto your servers? Download link: [url]https://www.moddb.com/downloads/start/45277/all?referer=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.moddb.com%2Fmods%2Fhl2dm-pro%2Fdownloads[/url]

item.description:

Read full topic

item.title: AG2 Maps
item.dc:creator: vamp
item.description:
Thanks that would be great!

This is a good map pack from the Adrenaline Gamer 2 Source mod.
I’d guess this would greatly help increase player activity if some kick ass server hosted them.

I’ve tried them just now offline for the first time they work great!
Apart from what I suspected, the majority of entity names for the world weapons, items and charges need to be corrected.
That is all.

Armor, Health, shotgun, rpg, longjump work.
Altough the origin/position can look off due to different model usage in black mesa.

Read full topic
